system.descriptor: Safely employing explosives to achieve a desired effect, such as cutting through bulkheads, destroying targets without collatoral damage, etc. Diffusing Explosives left by others, and manufacturing explosives, fuses, and blasting caps from component materials.
system.uses:
Use: Manufacture Explosives. Extended Skill Test, Make explosives from components. Difficulty varies on materials and complexity.
Use: Place Explosives. Full Action/Extended Test, place explosives and relevent detonation methods. 4+ DoF accidental explosion. DoS increase difficulty of diffusing. Use: Defuse Explosive. Opposed Skill Test vs Opponent's Demolition Test of setter. Win defuses, fail doesn't, 4+ DoF detonates device. May be extended test for multiple charges.
